title: Panel, 1816
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller (brown) and block (yellow ) on plain weave
dimensions:
H x W: 242 x 139 cm (7 ft. 11 1/4 in. x 54 3/4 in.)
Repeat H: 47 cm (18 1/2 in.)
description: Four scenes , placed as 'islands' on a diamond lattice ground with stars. The scenes represent sculpture, architecture, musicm and perhaps painting. This is one panel from a bedcover. Quilted and lined.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, 1816.
1816. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller (brown) and block (yellow ) on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-176.
